description:
In this adobe bridge course you will learn how use the application to navigate your files faster , organize image , files and graphics ,

we will start the course by taking a look at the UI to make you comfortable with the application , once you get your feet inside we will jump into the application with its time saving features , and efficient workflow

you will learn tips and trick to organize your images and files in general

wheather you are photoshop,illustrator,indesign ,or any other adobe software user and no matter what level you are in this course is for you
title: Adobe Bridge CC
